name: Diego Colombo
bio: Using typescript professionally on projects, I love to network and help

name: Cedd Burge
bio: I'm a software lead / architect / manager type thing and I have a strong focus on code quality. Typescript has an incredible type system, which helps confidence when refactoring, and allows the IDE (VS Code in my case) to provide more help. It's definitely a step up from Javascript for me, although other opinions are available.
